concept.title: Expression Completion
concept.shortdesc: Expression completion provides a list of expression elements that are valid for use at that location. Use Ctrl + Spacebar to invoke expression completion for help with writing an expression or condition.

conbody.p: pipelinesexpression completionexpression completionoverviewWhen you invoke expression completion, a list of valid data types, constants, fields, and functions display. The list includes pipeline constants when defined, and available fields when the pipeline is valid for data preview.

From the list, you can click an element for more information and double-click the element to add it to the expression. Alternatively, you can use the arrow keys to scroll through the list and click Enter to add it to the expression.
When an element does not display in the list, it is not a valid element at the specified location.
